  • Uses of Experimental in camzup.pfriendly

    Methods in camzup.pfriendly with annotations of type Experimental 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Up3.dolly​(float z)
    Dollies the camera, moving it on its local z axis, backward or forward.
    void Up3.moveByLocal​(float x, float y, float z)
    Moves the renderer's camera by a vector relative to its orientation; causes the camera to orbit around the locus at which it is looking.
    Vec2 Yup2.screen​(Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
    Finds the screen position of a point in the world.

    More efficient than calling PApplet.screenX(float, float, float) , PApplet.screenY(float, float, float) , and PApplet.screenZ(float, float, float) separately.
    Vec2 YupJ2.screen​(Vec2 source, Vec2 target)
    Finds the screen position of a point in the world.
    float YupJ2.screenX​(float x, float y)
    Takes a two-dimensional x, y position and returns the x value for where it will appear on a two-dimensional screen.
    float YupJ2.screenY​(float x, float y)
    Takes a two-dimensional x, y position and returns the y value for where it will appear on a two-dimensional screen.
    static processing.core.PShape Convert.toPShape​(processing.core.PGraphics rndr, MeshEntity2 source)
    Converts a 2D mesh entity to a PShape.
    static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL Convert.toPShape​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, MeshEntity2 source)
    Converts a 2D mesh entity to a PShapeOpenGL.
    static processing.opengl.PShapeOpenGL Convert.toPShape​(processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL rndr, MeshEntity3 source)
    Converts a 2D mesh entity to a PShapeOpenGL.
